My name is Shayan, I am 14 years old and I was born on April 15, 2010

I was born in Dallas, Texas, but I am Pakistani 
![Pakistan](data:image/png;base64,)

One of my favorite hobbies is playing football, I feel a deep connection with football because that is how I can physically express emotions. Some people say football is a dangerous sport, but as I have played footbll more and more, I have learned that you will only get hurt if you don't know what you are doing or if you are scared.

![Football](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
